entry.content:
Homework 4 - Is there life after graduate school

Description

This homework uses table 15.

Firstly, it uses openppyxl to obtain the indent in excel, then based on the indent to divide the hierarchical relationship in index.

The dashboard has three figures, one drop-down box and one time slider. The drop-down can choose male data, female data or total data,while the time slider can choose year. The first bar figure can show the doctorate recipents number by broad field this year. When we move the cursor to the histogram of a certain field, the second bar figure will show the subdivisions of doctorate recipents in this field, and the third line chart will show this field doctorate recipents every year.

div.cell {
  /* Old browsers */
  display: -webkit-box;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;

/* The following gets added to the <head> if it is detected that the user has a
 * monospace font with inconsistent normal/bold/italic height.  See

 */
.CodeMirror {

}

  /*  The CodeMirror docs are a bit fuzzy on if overflow-y should be hidden or visible.*/

}
.CodeMirror-lines {
  /* In CM2, this used to be 0.4em, but in CM3 it went to 4px. We need the em value because */

  /* Note that this should set vertical padding only, since CodeMirror assumes
       that horizontal padding will be set on CodeMirror pre */
  padding: 0.4em 0;
}

}

}
.CodeMirror pre {
  /* In CM3 this went to 4px from 0 in CM2. This sets horizontal padding only,
    use .CodeMirror-lines for vertical */
  padding: 0 0.4em;
  border: 0;
  border-radius: 0;
}
.CodeMirror-cursor {
  border-left: 1.4px solid black;
}
@media screen and (min-width: 2138px) and (max-width: 4319px) {

}

}
/* class for the output area when it should be height-limited */
div.output_scroll {
  /* ideally, this would be max-height, but FF barfs all over that */
  height: 24em;
  /* FF needs this *and the wrapper* to specify full width, or it will shrinkwrap */
  width: 100%;
  overflow: auto;
  border-radius: 2px;
  -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);

}
/* output div while it is collapsed */
div.output_collapsed {

/* This class is for the output subarea inside the output_area and after

div.output_subarea {

div.output_scroll div.output_subarea {

/* The rest of the output_* classes are for special styling of the different

div.output_text {

  line-height: 1.21429em;
}
/* stdout/stderr are 'text' as well as 'stream', but execute_result/error are *not* streams */
div.output_stderr {
  background: #fdd;
  /* very light red background for stderr */
}
div.output_latex {

/* Empty output_javascript divs should have no height */

<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="Homework-4---Is-there-life-after-graduate-school?">Homework 4 - Is there life after graduate school?<a class="anchor-link" href="#Homework-4---Is-there-life-after-graduate-school?">¶</a></h2><h4 id="Ruiqi-Zhang">Ruiqi Zhang<a class="anchor-link" href="#Ruiqi-Zhang">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Blog:">Blog:<a class="anchor-link" href="#Blog:">¶</a></h4><p><a href="https://ruiqi-zhang063.github.io">https://ruiqi-zhang063.github.io</a></p>
<h4 id="Github-repository">Github repository<a class="anchor-link" href="#Github-repository">¶</a></h4><p><a href="https://github.com/ruiqi-zhang063/ruiqi-zhang063.github.io">https://github.com/ruiqi-zhang063/ruiqi-zhang063.github.io</a></p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Description">Description<a class="anchor-link" href="#Description">¶</a></h4><p>This homework uses table 15.</p>
<p>Firstly, it uses openppyxl to obtain the indent in excel, then based on the indent to divide the hierarchical relationship in index.</p>
<p>The dashboard has three figures, one drop-down box and one time slider. The drop-down can choose male data, female data or total data,while the time slider can choose year. The first bar figure can show the doctorate recipents number by broad field this year. When we move the cursor to the histogram of a certain field, the second bar figure will show the subdivisions of doctorate recipents in this field, and the third line chart will show this field doctorate recipents every year.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Import-packages">Import packages<a class="anchor-link" href="#Import-packages">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [1]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">os</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">pandas</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">pd</span>

<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">dash</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">dash_core_components</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">dcc</span>

<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">dash.dependencies</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Output</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">plotly.express</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="nn">px</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">warnings</span>

<span class="n">warnings</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">filterwarnings</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'ignore'</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>We can see that the column "Sex and major field of study" has different levels. In original excel table, this level can be divided by indent. Therefore, we want to increase a column "indent" to indicate the hierarchical relationship.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="The-indent-of-data-decides-the-index-level,-using-openpyxl-to-obtain-indent-of-the-first-column">The indent of data decides the index level, using openpyxl to obtain indent of the first column<a class="anchor-link" href="#The-indent-of-data-decides-the-index-level,-using-openpyxl-to-obtain-indent-of-the-first-column">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [3]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">worksheet</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">load_workbook</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'data_tables/sed17-sr-tab015.xlsx'</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="s1">'Table 15'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">indent</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">cell</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">worksheet</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'A'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">:]:</span>
    <span class="n">indent</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">cell</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">alignment</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">indent</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Insert-indent-to-dataframe-and-change-the-columns-name-to-string">Insert indent to dataframe and change the columns name to string<a class="anchor-link" href="#Insert-indent-to-dataframe-and-change-the-columns-name-to-string">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [4]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">column_names</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">index</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">index</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">columns</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">column_names</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">insert</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">column_names</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">insert</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Broad Field'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">data_indent</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reindex</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">column_names</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">data_indent</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">indent</span>
<span class="n">column_names</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span><span class="n">year</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">int</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">year</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">year</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">column_names</span> <span class="k">if</span> <span class="nb">type</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">year</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">column_names</span>
<span class="n">data_indent</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rename</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">columns</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">column_names</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Divide-data-based-on-gender">Divide data based on gender<a class="anchor-link" href="#Divide-data-based-on-gender">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [5]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">data_indent_total</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent</span><span class="p">[:</span><span class="mi">45</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">data_indent_male</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">45</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="mi">90</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">data_indent_female</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">90</span><span class="p">:]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">copy</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h4 id="Insert-Broad-Field-to-dataframe">Insert Broad Field to dataframe<a class="anchor-link" href="#Insert-Broad-Field-to-dataframe">¶</a></h4>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [6]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">temp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Na'</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">data_indent_total</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">data_indent_total</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">temp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_total</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Sex and major field of study'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">data_indent_total</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">data_indent_total</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Broad Field'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">temp</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">temp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Sex and major field of study'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Broad Field'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">temp</span>
        
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">temp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Sex and major field of study'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Broad Field'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">temp</span>
</pre></div>

</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>We can see that compared to 2008, there are less doctorate recipients in the field "Education" in 2017.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [9]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">fields</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">analysis_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Sex and major field of study'</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">Rate_dict</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{}</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">field</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">fields</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">male_number</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'2017'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Sex and major field of study'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">field</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">female_number</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">float</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'2017'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Sex and major field of study'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">field</span><span class="p">])</span>
    <span class="n">Rate_dict</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">field</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">male_number</span> <span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">female_number</span>
<span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s1">'Field'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">Rate_dict</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">keys</span><span class="p">(),</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'Rate (Male / Female)'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">Rate_dict</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">values</span><span class="p">()})</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">by</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="sa">r</span><span class="s1">'Rate (Male / Female)'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">ascending</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[9]:</div>



<div class="output_html rendered_html output_subarea output_execute_result">

      <th>Rate (Male / Female)</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>

<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">external_stylesheets</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'https://codepen.io/chriddyp/pen/bWLwgP.css'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">app</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dash</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Dash</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="vm">__name__</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">external_stylesheets</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">external_stylesheets</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">available_indicators</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Total'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Male'</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s1">'Female'</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">app</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">layout</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">html</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Div</span><span class="p">([</span>
    
    <span class="n">html</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">H1</span><span class="p">(</span>

        <span class="n">style</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="s1">'textAlign'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'center'</span>
        <span class="p">}</span>
    <span class="p">),</span>
    
    <span class="n">html</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Div</span><span class="p">([</span>
        <span class="n">html</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Div</span><span class="p">([</span>
            <span class="n">dcc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Dropdown</span><span class="p">(</span>
                <span class="nb">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Gender'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                <span class="n">options</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[{</span><span class="s1">'label'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'value'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">}</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">available_indicators</span><span class="p">],</span>
                <span class="n">value</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Total'</span>
            <span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="p">],</span>
        <span class="n">style</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'width'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'49%'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'display'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'inline-block'</span><span class="p">}),</span>
    <span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">style</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span>
        <span class="s1">'padding'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'10px 5px'</span>
    <span class="p">}),</span>

    <span class="n">html</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Div</span><span class="p">([</span>
        <span class="s1">'Doctorate Recipients by Broad Field'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">dcc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Graph</span><span class="p">(</span>
            <span class="nb">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Broad-Field-Bar'</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="n">hoverData</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'points'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="p">[{</span><span class="s1">'customdata'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'Engineering'</span><span class="p">}]}</span>
        <span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">style</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'width'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'49%'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'display'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'inline-block'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'padding'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'0 20'</span><span class="p">}),</span>
    
    <span class="n">html</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Div</span><span class="p">([</span>
        <span class="s1">'Doctorate Recipients in Specific Field'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">dcc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Graph</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Specific-Field-Bar'</span><span class="p">),</span>
    <span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">style</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'display'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'inline-block'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'width'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'49%'</span><span class="p">}),</span>
    
    <span class="n">html</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Div</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dcc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Slider</span><span class="p">(</span>
        <span class="nb">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Year-Slider'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nb">min</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">2008</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="nb">max</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">value</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">2017</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">marks</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">year</span><span class="p">):</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">year</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">year</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2008</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">2018</span><span class="p">)},</span>
        <span class="n">step</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">None</span>
    <span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">style</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'width'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'49%'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'padding'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'0px 20px 20px 20px'</span><span class="p">}),</span>
    
    <span class="n">html</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Div</span><span class="p">([</span>
        <span class="s1">'Doctorate Recipients Every Year in Broad Field'</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">dcc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Graph</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">id</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Time-Series'</span><span class="p">),</span>
    <span class="p">]),</span>
<span class="p">])</span>

<span class="nd">@app</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">callback</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">dash</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dependencies</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Output</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Broad-Field-Bar'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'figure'</span><span class="p">),</span>
    <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">dash</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dependencies</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Gender'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'value'</span><span class="p">),</span>
     <span class="n">dash</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dependencies</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Year-Slider'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'value'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">update_graph</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Gender</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Year</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">Gender</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Total'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">dff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_total</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">data_indent_total</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">Gender</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Male'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">dff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">dff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>

    <span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">px</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">bar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dff</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Sex and major field of study'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Year</span><span class="p">))</span>

    <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_traces</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">customdata</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dff</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Sex and major field of study'</span><span class="p">])</span>
    
    <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_xaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Broad Field'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_yaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Doctorate Recipients Number'</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_layout</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">margin</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'l'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">40</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'b'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">40</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'t'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'r'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">},</span> <span class="n">hovermode</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'closest'</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">fig</span>

<span class="nd">@app</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">callback</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">dash</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dependencies</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Output</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Specific-Field-Bar'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'figure'</span><span class="p">),</span>
    <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">dash</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dependencies</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Broad-Field-Bar'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'hoverData'</span><span class="p">),</span>
     <span class="n">dash</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dependencies</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Gender'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'value'</span><span class="p">),</span>
     <span class="n">dash</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dependencies</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Year-Slider'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'value'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="p">])</span>
<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">update_Specific_Field_Bar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hoverData</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Gender</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Year</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">Gender</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Total'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">dff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_total</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">data_indent_total</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Broad Field'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">hoverData</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'points'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'customdata'</span><span class="p">]]</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">Gender</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Male'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">dff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Broad Field'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">hoverData</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'points'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'customdata'</span><span class="p">]]</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">dff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Broad Field'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">hoverData</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'points'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'customdata'</span><span class="p">]]</span>
    
    <span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">px</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">bar</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dff</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Sex and major field of study'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Year</span><span class="p">))</span>
    
    <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_xaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Specific Field in '</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">hoverData</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'points'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'customdata'</span><span class="p">])</span> 
    
    <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_yaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Doctorate Recipients Number'</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">fig</span>

<span class="nd">@app</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">callback</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="n">dash</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dependencies</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Output</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Time-Series'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'figure'</span><span class="p">),</span>
    <span class="p">[</span><span class="n">dash</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dependencies</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Broad-Field-Bar'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'hoverData'</span><span class="p">),</span>
     <span class="n">dash</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dependencies</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Input</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Gender'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'value'</span><span class="p">),</span>
    <span class="p">])</span>

<span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">create_time_series</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">hoverData</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Gender</span><span class="p">):</span>
    
    <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">Gender</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Total'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">dff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_total</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">data_indent_total</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">elif</span> <span class="n">Gender</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'Male'</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">dff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">data_indent_male</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">else</span><span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">dff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">data_indent_female</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'indent'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">]</span>
        
    <span class="n">dff</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">dff</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">dff</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'Sex and major field of study'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="n">hoverData</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'points'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'customdata'</span><span class="p">]]</span>
    
    <span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">2008</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">2018</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">dff</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">iloc</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])[</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span>

    <span class="n">fig</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">px</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">scatter</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_traces</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">mode</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'lines+markers'</span><span class="p">)</span>

    <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_xaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">showgrid</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_xaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Year'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">update_yaxes</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'Doctorate Recipients Number'</span><span class="p">)</span>
    
    <span class="n">fig</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add_annotation</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mf">0.85</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">xanchor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'left'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">yanchor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'bottom'</span><span class="p">,</span>
                       <span class="n">xref</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'paper'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">yref</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'paper'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">showarrow</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">align</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'left'</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                       <span class="n">text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Doctorate Recipients Number in '</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">hoverData</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'points'</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">][</span><span class="s1">'customdata'</span><span class="p">])</span>

    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">fig</span>

<span class="k">if</span> <span class="vm">__name__</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="s1">'__main__'</span><span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">app</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">run_server</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
